H0.text: Meter stick and spring scale are the tools needed to measure the effects of friction on a block of wood.

H1.text: Balance and stopwatch are the tools needed to measure the effects of friction on a block of wood.

H2.text: Balance and meter stick are the tools needed to measure the effects of friction on a block of wood.

H3.text: A meter stick and a stopwatch are needed to measure the effects of friction on a block of wood.
